oai_dc:dc.dc:title: James Robertson Parkway ribbon cutting ceremony with Mayor Ben West, Nashville, Tennessee, 1958 November
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph related to the ribbon cutting ceremony of Nashville Mayor Ben West's opening of the James Robertson Parkway, Nashville, Tennessee, circa November 1958. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West, Ben, 1911-1974
